meanings.definition: A coiled spring used in a bed to provide support.
meanings.sent1: The old mattress had a broken bedspring that made it uncomfortable to sleep on.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new bed with high-quality bedsprings for better back support.
meanings.sent3: When the mischievous cat jumped on the bed, it accidentally poked a hole in the bedspring!
meanings.sent4: His energy was like a tightly wound bedspring, ready to bounce into action at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The bedspring creaked loudly as he sat down, reminding him it was time for a new mattress.
